amendment.description: SEC.___. None of the finds made available by this Act may be used to negotiate or enter into a trade agreement whose negotiating texts are confidential. The limitation described in this section shall not apply in the case of the administration of a tax or tariff.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to negotiate or enter into a trade agreement whose negotiating texts are confidential.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 27 - 399, 1 Present (Roll no. 282).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 27 - 399, 1 Present (Roll no. 282).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Grayson.
